name: Spokata-RealTimeNews
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spokata
Developer Terms of Use
des: At Spokata, we’ve created a better way to be informed on the news that matters most to you. Our technology creates brief summaries of online news articles, and then delivers audio streams to you, using text to speech (TTS) automation. Listen to real-time breaking news in the fastest and most accessible way possible.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
